w:r.w:t: The teacher will teach about places and activities by using TPR, sentence frames, and vocabulary. Students will study these words and phrases:
town, park, street, movie theater, restaurant, mall, art, history, science, big, small, new, old, beautiful
At completion of this lesson, students will be able to:
Recognize, spell, and pronounce the words for places and associated activities
Spell and pronounce common associated words
Use both sets of words in complete sentences
Word List: town, park, street, movie theater, restaurant, food, mall, art, history, science, big, small, new, old, beautiful
This slide will always be the

Word Wall Vocabulary Builder Activity Slide
Students will read and spell their new words:
town, park, street, restaurant, movie theater, mall, new, old, small, big, art, history, science
Teacher will give feedback on the spelling and pronunciation of the new words.
